I'm not sure that we're anymore clear on their uniform than we are on the 
Shinsengumi one. If it helps just describe what the men chasing Sakamoto and 
Tatsu in the PMK anime were wearing. That's who they were supposed to be. You 
could also go by what the character of Sasaki in the NHK drama was wearing since 
he was their leader.

-MissB
